welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Thorold, Canada! We are delighted to have you here and hope you enjoy our charming city known for its historic sites and natural beauty. We invite you to explore and make unforgettable memories in Thorold."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St Catharines Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at St Catharines Airport is responsible for the transportation of goods and packages.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Niagara Falls International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Niagara Falls International Airport serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Buffalo Niagara International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 at Buffalo Niagara International Airport is primarily used for low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a login or registration.
